competenciasEspecificas: 1. Understand and interpret both the overall meaning and key details of texts expressed clearly in standard language, by seeking reliable sources and using strategies such as inferring meaning, in order to meet specific communicative needs (LCC2, LCC3, PC1, PC2, STEM1, DC1, PSL5, CAEC2).

2. Produce original, medium-length texts that are simple and clearly structured, using strategies such as planning, compensating or self-correcting, in order to express relevant messages in a creative, appropriate and coherent manner and to achieve specific communicative purposes (LCC1, PC1, PC2, STEM1, DC2, PSL5, EC1, CAEC3).

3.Engage in interaction with others with increasing autonomy, using cooperation strategies and drawing on both analogue and digital resources, to fulfil specific communicative goals in respectful exchanges that follow conventions of politeness (LCC5, PC1, PC2, STEM1, PSL3, CC3).

4. Act as a mediator in everyday situations across different languages, using simple strategies and knowledge aimed at explaining concepts or simplifying messages, in order to convey information effectively, clearly and responsibly (LCC5, PC1, PC2, PC3, STEM1, PSL1, PSL3, CAEC1).

5. Expand and use one’s personal linguistic repertoire across different languages, reflecting critically on how language works and becoming aware of one’s own strategies and knowledge, to improve one’s ability to respond to specific communicative needs (PC2, STEM1, PSL1, PSL5, DC2).

6. Critically value and adapt to linguistic, cultural and artistic diversity through the foreign language, identifying and sharing similarities and differences between languages and cultures, in order to act empathetically and respectfully in intercultural situations (LCC5, PC3, PSL1, PSL3, CC3, CAEC1).
